401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

experiment_id.description: ID of the experiment under which to log the tag. Must be provided.

key.description:
Name of the tag. Maximum size depends on storage backend.
All storage backends are guaranteed to support key values up to 250 bytes in size.

value.description:
String value of the tag being logged. Maximum size depends on storage backend.
All storage backends are guaranteed to support key values up to 5000 bytes in size.

post.description: Sets a tag on an experiment. Experiment tags are metadata that can be updated.
